text: What are the downsides of using Python instead of Objective-C?
I know some Python and I'm really impressed by the language's ease of use.
From what I've seen of Objective-C it looks a lot less pretty, but it seems to be the lingua franca for Mac OS X development (which means it has better documentation).
I'm thinking about starting Mac development - will using PyObjC+Python make me a second class citizen?
